A cartoon primer on online advertising






















If you want to learn more about online advertising, here are some sources:

  • An article about YouTube's violation of COPPA
  • The FTC's guidelines and FAQs for influencer endorsements
  • The antitrust complaint filed against Google's online ad empire
  • For detailed info about how ads work on YouTube and Google Ads:
    • Docs on how ads work, for content creators
    • Docs on ad-friendly content, for content creators
    • Docs on how AdSense works, for publishers
    • Docs on ad targeting, for publishers
    • An overview of YouTube's ad policy, for advertisers
    • Docs on inappropriate content, for advertisers
    • Docs on bidding and budgeting, for advertisers
    • Definitions of impression, click and conversion
    • Docs on attribution, for advertisers

  • The YouTube channel of Ann Reardon, a food scientist and YouTuber who creates a lot of "debunking" videos about viral cooking/baking content produced by content farms
  • A leaked memo from the YouTuber MrBeast's production company
